MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK10 postcode area of Alloa. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:10am. Our engineers have arrived at Dunmar substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13am on Wednesday 21st April 2021
